beselI.f90

00001       FUNCTION BESSI(N,X)
00002 !
00003 !     This subroutine calculates the first kind modified Bessel function
00004 !     of integer order N, for any REAL X. We use here the classical
00005 !     recursion formula, when X > N. For X < N, the Miller's algorithm
00006 !     is used to avoid overflows. 
00007 !     REFERENCE:
00008 !     C.W.CLENSHAW, CHEBYSHEV SERIES FOR MATHEMATICAL FUNCTIONS,
00009 !     MATHEMATICAL TABLES, VOL.5, 1962.
00010 !
00011       PARAMETER (IACC = 40,BIGNO = 1.D10, BIGNI = 1.D-10)
00012       REAL *8 X,BESSI,BESSI0,BESSI1,TOX,BIM,BI,BIP
00013       IF (N.EQ.0) THEN
00014       BESSI = BESSI0(X)
00015       RETURN
00016       ENDIF
00017       IF (N.EQ.1) THEN
00018       BESSI = BESSI1(X)
00019       RETURN
00020       ENDIF
00021       IF(X.EQ.0.D0) THEN
00022       BESSI=0.D0
00023       RETURN
00024       ENDIF
00025       TOX = 2.D0/X
00026       BIP = 0.D0
00027       BI  = 1.D0
00028       BESSI = 0.D0
00029       M = 2*((N+INT(SQRT(FLOAT(IACC*N)))))
00030       DO 12 J = M,1,-1
00031       BIM = BIP+DFLOAT(J)*TOX*BI
00032       BIP = BI
00033       BI  = BIM
00034       IF (ABS(BI).GT.BIGNO) THEN
00035       BI  = BI*BIGNI
00036       BIP = BIP*BIGNI
00037       BESSI = BESSI*BIGNI
00038       ENDIF
00039       IF (J.EQ.N) BESSI = BIP
00040    12 CONTINUE
00041       BESSI = BESSI*BESSI0(X)/BI
00042       RETURN
00043       END function BESSI
00044 ! ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00045 ! Auxiliary Bessel functions for N=0, N=1
00046       FUNCTION BESSI0(X)
00047       REAL *8 X,BESSI0,Y,P1,P2,P3,P4,P5,P6,P7,  
00048       Q1,Q2,Q3,Q4,Q5,Q6,Q7,Q8,Q9,AX,BX
00049       DATA P1,P2,P3,P4,P5,P6,P7/1.D0,3.5156229D0,3.0899424D0,1.2067429D0,  &
00050       0.2659732D0,0.360768D-1,0.45813D-2/
00051       DATA Q1,Q2,Q3,Q4,Q5,Q6,Q7,Q8,Q9/0.39894228D0,0.1328592D-1, &
00052       0.225319D-2,-0.157565D-2,0.916281D-2,-0.2057706D-1,  &
00053       0.2635537D-1,-0.1647633D-1,0.392377D-2/
00054       IF(ABS(X).LT.3.75D0) THEN
00055       Y=(X/3.75D0)**2
00056       BESSI0=P1+Y*(P2+Y*(P3+Y*(P4+Y*(P5+Y*(P6+Y*P7)))))
00057       ELSE
00058       AX=ABS(X)
00059       Y=3.75D0/AX
00060       BX=EXP(AX)/SQRT(AX)
00061       AX=Q1+Y*(Q2+Y*(Q3+Y*(Q4+Y*(Q5+Y*(Q6+Y*(Q7+Y*(Q8+Y*Q9)))))))
00062       BESSI0=AX*BX
00063       ENDIF
00064       RETURN
00065       END function BESSI0 
00066 ! ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00067       FUNCTION BESSI1(X)
00068       REAL *8 X,BESSI1,Y,P1,P2,P3,P4,P5,P6,P7,  
00069       Q1,Q2,Q3,Q4,Q5,Q6,Q7,Q8,Q9,AX,BX
00070       DATA P1,P2,P3,P4,P5,P6,P7/0.5D0,0.87890594D0,0.51498869D0,  &
00071       0.15084934D0,0.2658733D-1,0.301532D-2,0.32411D-3/
00072       DATA Q1,Q2,Q3,Q4,Q5,Q6,Q7,Q8,Q9/0.39894228D0,-0.3988024D-1, &
00073       -0.362018D-2,0.163801D-2,-0.1031555D-1,0.2282967D-1, &
00074       -0.2895312D-1,0.1787654D-1,-0.420059D-2/
00075       IF(ABS(X).LT.3.75D0) THEN
00076       Y=(X/3.75D0)**2
00077       BESSI1=X*(P1+Y*(P2+Y*(P3+Y*(P4+Y*(P5+Y*(P6+Y*P7))))))
00078       ELSE
00079       AX=ABS(X)
00080       Y=3.75D0/AX
00081       BX=EXP(AX)/SQRT(AX)
00082       AX=Q1+Y*(Q2+Y*(Q3+Y*(Q4+Y*(Q5+Y*(Q6+Y*(Q7+Y*(Q8+Y*Q9)))))))
00083       BESSI1=AX*BX
00084       ENDIF
00085       RETURN
00086       END function BESSI1
00087 ! ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00088 
00089 ! end of file tbessi.f90
00090
